title: Item
description: Items are generated dynamically by the AI but validated against this schema.

id.description: A unique identifier for the item (e.g., 'item:healing_potion')

effect.description: Free-text summary of the item's primary effect

damage.description: Dice notation for damage if applicable (e.g., '1d6+2')

ac_bonus.description: Bonus to Armor Class, if applicable

charges.description: Number of charges if it's a magical item
